name: edit_artifact
description: Edit an existing artifact's content. Use this tool when you need to update the content of a previously saved artifact.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the artifact to edit

content.description: The new content of the artifact. Use base64 encoding for binary files (images), plain text for text files.

encoding.description: Content encoding. Use 'base64' for binary files, 'text' for text files.

artifact_id.description: Unique identifier of the edited artifact

s3_bucket.description: S3 bucket where the artifact is stored

s3_key.description: S3 object key where the artifact is stored

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was updated
